author: mark-grimes
body: Fixes the TrackingParticle selection so that it includes pileup. Otherwise fakerates are ~90% [cite Kevin Stenson] for samples with pileup. Not sure about the change to minHitTP but I'm told 0 is the correct value.  This is an SLHC version of #3304 and #3455.
title: Fix TrackingParticle selection for pileup
